# Before-After-Control-Impact


## Which design
Four standard BACI DesignsFour standard BACI designs:
1. Single impact site; single control site; one year before; oneyear after
2. Single/multiple impact site; multiple control sites; one yearbefore; one year after
3. Single impact site; single control site; multiple yearsbefore; multiple years after.
4. Single impact site; multiple control sites; multiple yearsbefore; multiple years after
